pageProps.content:
![High1 Resort (ÌïòÏù¥Ïõê Î¶¨Ï°∞Ìä∏)](/2022-09-28-1664358710308/1982091_image2_1.webp) ## Overview > Named to reflect the concept ‚Äúfirst and foremost,‚Äù High1 is a multipurpose leisure resort consisting of High1 Resort, Kangwon Land Convention Hotel, Kangwon Land Casino, High1 Grand Hotel Main Tower, High1 Ski, High1 C.C., High1 Hotel, Valley Condominium, and Mountain Condominium. The ski resort, one of the most popular parts of the High1 complex, offers a 4.2 kilometer-long slope for beginners that runs from the summit of Jijangsan Mountain (altitude 1,345 meters). The ski resort has a total of 18 slopes, 3 gondolas, and 7 lifts.

The two hotels and three condominiums at High1 house a total of 1,577 rooms. Frequented by both Korean and non-Korean travelers, High1 also boasts an 18-hole golf course and Unamjeong, a traditional Korean restaurant. Nearby tourist sites include Jeongseon Rail Bike, Ararichon, Auraji, Gariwangsan Recreational Forest, Jeongseon 5-day Market, Mindungsan Mountain, Donggang River, Jeongseon Sogeumgang River, and Hwaamdonggul Cave. ## Intro | | | | - | - | |infocenter:|‚Ä¢ 1330 Travel Hotline: +82-2-1330
(Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese)
‚Ä¢ For more info: +82-1588-7789| |parking:|Available (6,287 parking spaces)| |restdate:|N/A (Open all year round)| ## Detail Info | | | | - | - | |Restrooms:|Available| ## Detail Image ![/2022-09-28-1664358710308/693242_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-28-1664358710308/693242_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-28-1664358710308/904791_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-28-1664358710308/904791_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-28-1664358710308/1583457_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-28-1664358710308/1583457_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-28-1664358710308/1583459_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-28-1664358710308/1583459_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-28-1664358710308/1982074_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-28-1664358710308/1982074_image2_1.webp) ## Contact - [‚òéÔ∏è+82-1588-7789](tel:+8215887789) - [üè†www.high1.com]( http://www.high1.com/) ```googleMap latitude: 37.2067220484 longitude: 128.8377247370 title: 424, High1-gil, Jeongseon-gun, Gangwon-do ``` ## Directions [Bus + Taxi]
From Dong Seoul Bus Terminal, take a bus to Gohan Intercity Bus Terminal.
From Gohan Intercity Bus Terminal, take a taxi for approx. 10 min.

data.title: High1 Resort (ÌïòÏù¥Ïõê Î¶¨Ï°∞Ìä∏)
data.description:
Named to reflect the concept ‚Äúfirst and foremost,‚Äù High1 is a multipurpose leisure resort consisting of High1 Resort, Kangwon Land Convention Hotel, Kangwon Land Casino, High1 Grand Hotel Main Tower, High1 Ski, High1 C.C., High1 Hotel, Valley Condominium, and Mountain Condominium. The ski resort, one of the most popular parts of the High1 complex, offers a 4.2 kilometer-long slope for beginners that runs from the summit of Jijangsan Mountain (altitude 1,345 meters). The ski resort has a total of 18 slopes, 3 gondolas, and 7 lifts.

The two hotels and three condominiums at High1 house a total of 1,577 rooms. Frequented by both Korean and non-Korean travelers, High1 also boasts an 18-hole golf course and Unamjeong, a traditional Korean restaurant. Nearby tourist sites include Jeongseon Rail Bike, Ararichon, Auraji, Gariwangsan Recreational Forest, Jeongseon 5-day Market, Mindungsan Mountain, Donggang River, Jeongseon Sogeumgang River, and Hwaamdonggul Cave.
data.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Mukho Lighthouse (Î¨µÌò∏ Îì±ÎåÄ)
dataList.description:
Established on June 8, 1963, Mukho Lighthouse serves as a guarding beacon of ships coming and going at Mukho port.Mukho Lighthouse is a 12m-tall white circular concrete structure with two floors located at an altitude of 67m. It is surrounded by a cozy park where forsythias blossom in spring and visitors can overlook the sea. The park is home to the Maritime Fishing Exhibition Hall, where visitors can learn about the history of fishing in the area. The lighthouse and its surrounding area are full of quiet and comfortable spots to relax and enjoy the scenery.

Because of its location, the lighthouse is absolutely crucial to the safety of ships and boats coming into the port. The lighthouse‚Äôs large light, installed in October 2003, was developed by Korean scientists and uses a rotating prism lens that can shine beams of light as far as 42km.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Misiryeonggyegok Valley (ÎØ∏ÏãúÎ†πÍ≥ÑÍ≥°)
dataList.description: With Seoraksan Mountain to its northeast, Misiryeonggyegok Valley stretches from Yongdae Samgeori to Dojeokpokpo Falls at the valleys peak for approximately 4.8 kilometers. The beauty of Misireonggyegok Valley is as picturesque as those seen from traditional Asian paintings. Misiryeonggyegok Valleys hidden gems are Dojeokpokpo Falls and Chotdaebawi Rock, both rarely known to the public. The valley is also filled with a lush forest that stays cool even in the hot summer months.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Micheongolgyegok Valley (ÎØ∏Ï≤úÍ≥®Í≥ÑÍ≥°)
dataList.description: Micheongolgyegok Valley starts from the Yangyang area and ends right before Guryongnyeong Pass. With not many visitors here, the valley is left in a pristine condition. The area is famous for its rich forest, clean water, uniquely shaped rocks, wild flora and fauna, underground mineral water, cultural heritages of the ancient SIlla kingdom, locally produced honey and other forest products. The Micheongolgyegok Valley Recreational Forest is 5,652,000„é° in size filled with broadleaf trees.  At the entrance of the valley is Seollimwon Temple Site, which was originally established under the reign of King Beopheung of Silla and then closed at the end of the Goryeo dynasty. Other relics include a stone lamp, 3-story stone pagoda, Honggakseonsa Monk Pagoda, and a stupa.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Memorial Tower of Baengmagoji Battlefield and Memorial Museum (Î∞±ÎßàÍ≥†ÏßÄ ÏúÑÎ†πÎπÑÏôÄ Í∏∞ÎÖêÍ¥Ä)
dataList.description:
Located in the northern area of South Korea, Baengmagoji Battlefield was one of the bloodiest battlefields during the Korean War. The communist Chinese army launched a major offensive attack for 10 days on October 6, 1952 during the Battle of Baengmagoji, which can be translated into the Battle of White Horse Highlands. Due to this battle, the communist Chinese army suffered around 14,000 casualties and the army completely collapsed while the 9th Infantry Division won the Battle of Baengmagoji and got the nickname ‚ÄúWhite Horse.‚Äù

After the battle, the area gave off a bad smell because of the dead bodies. The mountain area lost its original shape due to the severe battle and as a result the area was named ‚ÄúBaengmagoji‚Äù as it was said to resemble a white horse (baengma) lying down.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Manhae Village (ÎßåÌï¥ÎßàÏùÑ)
dataList.description: Manhae Village was established as a training center and memorial hall for national activist Monk Manhae Han Yongun, revered for his literary and philosophical inspiration, as well as his devotion to the nation and Korean people during the Democracy Movement.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Mangyeongdae Pavilion (ÎßåÍ≤ΩÎåÄ)
dataList.description: Mangyeongdae Pavilion, located on the shore of the East Coast, one-kilometer east of Donghae City Hall, was built in 1613 while old Joseon was under the rule of King Gwanghaegun. However, the pavilion was destroyed by rainstorms and later rebuilt by the Samcheok Kim family some 60 years ago. While offering a spectacular view of sea to the east, the pavilion also offers a refreshing view of expansive pine forests to the north. If you look to the west, you will enjoy a magnificent view of Dutasan Mountain beyond the pavilion‚Äôs back lawn as well as the Jeoncheon Stream flowing into the East Sea alongside a steep cliff-wall. As only Jukseoru Pavilion of Samcheok matched its view, poets of former times are said to have frequented Mangyeongdae Pavilion.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Mangsang Beach (ÎßùÏÉÅÌï¥Î≥Ä)
dataList.description: Mangsang Beach is sought out by many families and tourists for its beautiful white sand, lush pine forest, shallow waters, and location in a neighborhood full of convenient facilities. Mangsang Beach is located 3 kilometers north from Mukho Port and it represents the east coast, along with Okgye and Gyeongpo Beaches.
dataList.author: korea-tour
